name: Mini Golf Resort
overview: Over 50 COURSES and 1000 HOLES will provide you with an unrivaled mini golf experience! Swing to win as you explore each of the theme-park-style courses and tee up for fun on every exciting hole! - Play in 3D - Up to 7 players with 4 Wii Remotes - Choose from 9 or 18 hole courses! - 10 Trophies and 8 power up bonuses - Customize your character's looks and wardrobe! - Discover distinct worlds like Pirate's Bay & Spooky House! THE ULTIMATE MINI GOLF PARTY!
